General.Name: Shenzhen Noposion Agrochemicals Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Noposion Crop Science Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and sells agricultural inputs in China and internationally. It offers pesticide preparations and plant nutrition products; and agricultural services. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Noposion Agrochemicals Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Shenzhen Noposion Crop Science Co., Ltd. in June 2023. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: No. 113, Xixiang Reservoir Road, Shenzhen, China, 518102
